title: iboss - Real-Time Zero Trust Analytics
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of Zero Trust activity across users, assets, and resources using logs.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of Zero Trust activity across users, assets, and resources using logs.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
